divs: Sighting Detailsi was driving home from dinner at my mother in laws. saw object when stopped ata light, didnt think anything strange about it thought it was an airplane, wehave an airport nearbye. when i got home it was still in sight, and then i got agood look at it, it had two stationary white lights on each end, could not tellthe shape, and in the middle were all different color lights. it just seemed tohover as it moved. no sound. i dont know if it was a blimp or not, but it suredidnt have lights like one. i just wanted to report it cause i couldnt make outwhat it was, maybe some other people saw it to who were closer. it just movedaway on an eastern route, went into the trees on the horizen. if i didnt have mykids in the car i would have chased it. but with the kids i just decided towatch from afar. well thats that, just wanted to report it, thanks for yourtime. mike
trends: There have been no other sightings in Lake Ronkonkoma
This sighting has never been favorited.
